title: Haiti's 'Baby Doc' Duvalier Dies At 63
teaser: Former Haitian dictator Jean-Claude "Baby Doc" Duvalier died last night. He was 63. Arun Rath talks with Jacqueline Charles of the Miami Herald about his life and the reaction in Haiti to his death.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
